title: 134 - All The Right Moves
description: On today's show, the boys chat about the all-time classic film, All The Right Moves, as well as the premiere of Falcon & Winter Soldier, and all the other things that they've been watching on all the different streaming services. In a loaded Pod FOD, the guys discuss pollution making babies penises smaller, what the inside of Mitt's brain looks like, Gumpy shares a few stories from the shipyard, the guys try to pick two sitcoms to live with for the rest of their lives, National Treasure is getting a new series on Disney Plus, and much more before Nick unveils a couple of new Friday Bangerz to help propel you into the weekend. Send your submissions for the show to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and follow The Pod on Youtube to watch full episodes of the show. Have a great weekend.
dc:creator: The Pod
